explanation: [0-0] An elderly man in a green shirt, khaki pants, and a yellow hat is standing in a room holding a white plastic bag. In the lower-left corner is a man wearing black clothes. The room has black bins and boxes, and the walls and door are white. A red emergency indicator light is mounted above the door.

[0-5] The elderly man in the green shirt smooths out the plastic bag in his hand, then places it vertically into the bin in front of him. He then bends down and secures the bag around the rim of the bin. At this moment, the man in the lower-left corner widens his eyes with a surprised expression.
